mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.order_number, a.contract_number, a.erp_number, a.product_order_number, a.client, a.linkman, a.product_name, a.stardard, a.attachment, a.unit, a.amount, a.single_price, a.sum_price, a.End_data, a.zttordertime, a.apply_id, a.state, a.cato_type, a.send_time, a.supplier_name, a.supplier_price, a.not_satisfy_reason, a.cato_type, a.delivery_note, a.supplier_bill_date, a.supplier_bill_price, a.cost_single_price, a.cost_sum_price, a.send_amount, a.bill_date_open, a.bill_price, a.cost_share, b.xt_userinfo_realName as personname FROM ztt_order a,xt_userinfo b WHERE 1=1 and a.apply_id=b.xt_userinfo_id and a.state!='20'
AND instr(state,#{state})
AND instr(product_name,#{product_name})
AND instr(cato_type,#{cato_type})
AND zttordertime<#{apply_time_et}
AND zttordertime>#{apply_time_st}
ORDER BY zttordertime desc

SELECT * FROM ztt_checkrecord WHERE 1=1
AND instr(order_id,#{order_id})
AND instr(id,#{id})
ORDER BY product_check_time desc

SELECT * FROM ztt_filerecord WHERE 1=1
AND instr(order_id,#{order_id})
AND instr(id,#{id})
ORDER BY approval_time desc

SELECT id, order_number, contract_number, erp_number, product_order_number, client, linkman, product_name, stardard, attachment, unit, amount, single_price, sum_price, End_data, zttordertime, apply_id, state, techmanager_id, techmanager_produc_id, techmanager_update_date, techmanager_attachment, producter_id, product_end_time, checker_id, checker_attachment, check_end_time, dept_check_id, dept_check_attachment, dept_check_end_time, material_id, machine_part, machine_part_number, not_satisfy_reason, cato_type, delivery_note, send_time, supplier_bill_date, supplier_bill_price, cost_single_price, cost_sum_price, send_amount, bill_date_open, bill_price, cost_share FROM ztt_order WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT id, order_id, Processname, Processcontent, equipment, tooling, single_price, sum_price, product_person_id, product_date, qualified_number, qualified_date FROM ztt_processproduct WHERE order_id=#{order_id}
SELECT id, ordernumber_first, ordernumber_second, ordernumber_third FROM ztt_ordernumber WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT ordernumber_third, order_id FROM ztt_ordernumber_third WHERE order_id=#{order_id}
select * from ztt_ordernumber_third where ordernumber_third=(select max(ordernumber_third) from ztt_ordernumber_third);
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ztt_ordernumber_third ( ordernumber_third, order_id ) VALUES ( #{ordernumber_third}, #{order_id} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM ztt_ordernumber_third WHERE order_id IN
#{item}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ztt_order ( id, order_number, contract_number, erp_number, product_order_number, client, linkman, product_name, stardard, attachment, unit, amount, single_price, sum_price, End_data, zttordertime, apply_id, state ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order_number}, #{contract_number}, #{erp_number}, #{product_order_number}, #{client}, #{linkman}, #{product_name}, #{stardard}, #{attachment}, #{unit}, #{amount}, #{single_price}, #{sum_price}, #{End_data}, #{zttordertime}, #{apply_id}, #{state} )

INSERT INTO ztt_checkrecord ( id, order_id, product_check_self_attachment, product_check_self_time, product_check_attachment, product_check_comment, product_check_time, product_check_dep_attachment, product_check_dep_comment, product_check_dep_time, state ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order_id}, #{product_check_self_attachment}, #{product_check_self_time}, #{product_check_attachment}, #{product_check_comment}, #{product_check_time}, #{product_check_dep_attachment}, #{product_check_dep_comment}, #{product_check_dep_time}, #{state} )

INSERT INTO ztt_filerecord ( id, order_id, product_check_self_attachment, product_check_self_time, product_check_attachment, product_check_comment, product_check_time, product_check_dep_attachment, product_check_dep_comment, product_check_dep_time, state, status_name, approval_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order_id}, #{product_check_self_attachment}, #{product_check_self_time}, #{product_check_attachment}, #{product_check_comment}, #{product_check_time}, #{product_check_dep_attachment}, #{product_check_dep_comment}, #{product_check_dep_time}, #{state}, #{status_name}, #{approval_time} )

INSERT INTO ztt_processproduct ( id, order_id, Processname, Processcontent, equipment, tooling, single_price, sum_price, product_person_id, product_date, qualified_number, qualified_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order_id}, #{Processname}, #{Processcontent}, #{equipment}, #{tooling}, #{single_price}, #{sum_price}, #{product_person_id}, #{product_date}, #{qualified_number}, #{qualified_date} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ztt_order SET order_number = #{order_number}, contract_number = #{contract_number}, erp_number = #{erp_number}, product_order_number = #{product_order_number}, client = #{client}, linkman = #{linkman}, product_name = #{product_name}, stardard = #{stardard}, attachment = #{attachment}, unit = #{unit}, amount = #{amount}, single_price = #{single_price}, sum_price = #{sum_price}, End_data = #{End_data}, zttordertime = #{zttordertime}, apply_id = #{apply_id}, state = #{state} WHERE id=#{id}

UPDATE ztt_processproduct
qualified_number = #{qualified_number},
qualified_date = #{qualified_date},
WHERE id=#{id}

UPDATE ztt_order
order_number = #{order_number},
contract_number = #{contract_number},
erp_number = #{erp_number},
product_order_number = #{product_order_number},
client = #{client},
linkman = #{linkman},
product_name = #{product_name},
stardard = #{stardard},
attachment = #{attachment},
unit = #{unit},
amount = #{amount},
single_price = #{single_price},
sum_price = #{sum_price},
End_data = #{End_data},
zttordertime = #{zttordertime},
apply_id = #{apply_id},
state = #{state},
producter_selfcheck_attachment = #{producter_selfcheck_attachment},
producter_id = #{producter_id},
product_end_time = #{product_end_time},
machine_part = #{machine_part},
machine_part_number = #{machine_part_number},
material_id = #{material_id},
techmanager_id = #{techmanager_id},
techmanager_update_date = #{techmanager_update_date},
techmanager_attachment = #{techmanager_attachment},
checker_id = #{checker_id},
checker_attachment = #{checker_attachment},
check_end_time = #{check_end_time},
dept_check_id = #{dept_check_id},
dept_check_attachment = #{dept_check_attachment},
dept_check_end_time = #{dept_check_end_time},
purchase_arrival_date = #{purchase_arrival_date},
supplier_name = #{supplier_name},
supplier_price = #{supplier_price},
not_satisfy_reason = #{not_satisfy_reason},
cato_type = #{cato_type},
delivery_note = #{delivery_note},
send_time = #{send_time},
supplier_bill_date = #{supplier_bill_date},
supplier_bill_price = #{supplier_bill_price},
cost_single_price = #{cost_single_price},
cost_sum_price = #{cost_sum_price},
send_amount = #{send_amount},
bill_date_open = #{bill_date_open},
bill_price = #{bill_price},
cost_share = #{cost_share},
WHERE id=#{id}

#{item}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ztt_order ( id, order_number, contract_number, erp_number, product_order_number, client, linkman, product_name, stardard, attachment, unit, amount, single_price, sum_price, End_data, zttordertime, apply_id, state ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.order_number}, #{item.contract_number}, #{item.erp_number}, #{item.product_order_number}, #{item.client}, #{item.linkman}, #{item.product_name}, #{item.stardard}, #{item.attachment}, #{item.unit}, #{item.amount}, #{item.single_price}, #{item.sum_price}, #{item.End_data}, #{item.zttordertime}, #{item.apply_id}, #{item.state} )

update.foreach: UPDATE ztt_order SET order_number = #{item.order_number}, contract_number = #{item.contract_number}, erp_number = #{item.erp_number}, product_order_number = #{item.product_order_number}, client = #{item.client}, linkman = #{item.linkman}, product_name = #{item.product_name}, stardard = #{item.stardard}, attachment = #{item.attachment}, unit = #{item.unit}, amount = #{item.amount}, single_price = #{item.single_price}, sum_price = #{item.sum_price}, End_data = #{item.End_data}, zttordertime = #{item.zttordertime}, apply_id = #{item.apply_id}, state = #{item.state} WHERE id=#{item.id}

UPDATE ztt_order
order_number = #{item.order_number},
contract_number = #{item.contract_number},
erp_number = #{item.erp_number},
product_order_number = #{item.product_order_number},
client = #{item.client},
linkman = #{item.linkman},
product_name = #{item.product_name},
stardard = #{item.stardard},
attachment = #{item.attachment},
unit = #{item.unit},
amount = #{item.amount},
single_price = #{item.single_price},
sum_price = #{item.sum_price},
End_data = #{item.End_data},
zttordertime = #{item.zttordertime},
apply_id = #{item.apply_id},
state = #{item.state},
WHERE id=#{item.id}
